content: The /show command allows you to move a job to another server or channel, revive a lost job, or refresh an old job to make new variations, upscale, or use newer parameters and features. The command requires a Job ID, which is a unique identifier for each image generated by Midjourney. Job IDs can be found in the first part of all image filenames, in the URLs on the website, and in an image's filename. To use the /show command, type '/show <Job ID>' in any Bot Channel to revive a Job.
